title: Brussels sprout and almond soup
ingredients: ['50g butter', '1 large onion, chopped', '75g flaked almonds', '500g Brussels sprouts, quartered', '1.2 litres vegetable stock', '1 bouquet garni', 'freshly grated nutmeg', 'freshly ground black pepper', '2 tbsp single cream (optional)', 'snipped fresh chives or toasted flaked almonds to garnish']
